coded_answer.p: I have just received your letter which is made me so hapyhappy. I can notcannot belivebelieve that I won first prize in your competition, because I always belivedbelievedhave always believed I am an unlukyunlucky man and now I think somethingssome things are changing in my life.

I have never enjoyed doing shopping, but nowdaynowadays there are some people who are callingcalled shopcholicshopaholicshopaholics.
